document_notes.text:
This update for perl-Convert-ASN1 fixes the following issue:

- CVE-2013-7488: Fixed an infinite loop via unexpected input (bsc#1168934).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: perl-Convert-ASN1 (aka the Convert::ASN1 module for Perl) through 0.27 allows remote attackers to cause an infinite loop via unexpected input.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP1:perl-Convert-ASN1-0.27-1.6.2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP2:perl-Convert-ASN1-0.27-1.6.2

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
